attributes.action: All meat should be labelled with Country of origin and method of slaughter.
attributes.additional_details: This should be a recognised right of the people to have knowledge and information about the food they are consuming, and it may avoid another scandal such as the horseflesh fiasco.
attributes.background: I believe the British Public should be aware of the origin of where the meat they are buying everyday is from and how the meat is slaughtered, regardless of whether it is cooked or raw meat. The public deserve the right to an informed choice.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details:
You may be interested in the following petitions which request similar actions:

Country Of Origin Labelling should be compulsory on all imported food
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325067 

All products sold in the UK to be clearly labelled with country of origin 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309019

Make it Law to Label Non-Religiously Slaughtered Meat Products
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300185

All halal and kosher certified products are to be prominently labelled as such
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300205

Make restaurants state how they source their meat and how it was slaughtered
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302189
